alert.note: Alert for Escambia; Santa Rosa (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued January 12 at 2:41PM EST until January 12 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Mobile
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 20 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 5 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN ALABAMA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 11 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL ALABAMA BUTLER CONECUH COVINGTON CRENSHAW ESCAMBIA MONROE WILCOX IN SOUTHWEST ALABAMA BALDWIN CLARKE MOBILE WASHINGTON IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN NORTHWEST FLORIDA ESCAMBIA SANTA ROSA IN MISSISSIPPI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST MISSISSIPPI GEORGE GREENE THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ANDALUSIA, ATMORE, BAY MINETTE, BELLVIEW, BRANTLEY, BRENT, BREWTON, CAMDEN, CHATOM, DAPHNE, ENSLEY, EVERGREEN, FERRY PASS, FLOMATON, GREENVILLE, GROVE HILL, GULF BREEZE, GULF SHORES, HOMEWOOD, JACKSON, LEAKESVILLE, LUCEDALE, LUVERNE, MCLAIN, MILLRY, MILTON, MOBILE, MONROEVILLE, MYRTLE GROVE, OPP, PACE, PENSACOLA, PINE HILL, PRICHARD, SARALAND, THOMASVILLE, AND TILLMANS CORNER.
